text.content:
Knockback

Crit Effect: The target is pushed [[/r 1d4*5#feet]] feet away.

Bludgeoning

Deep Hurting

Crit Effect: The target is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Fatigued]{Fatigued}.

Piercing

Gut Slash

The target takes @Localize[PF2E.PersistentDamage.Bleed1d4.success] and any creature it Swallows Whole is immediately released.

Slashing

Intense Splash

The target takes normal damage, and all creatures adjacent to the target take half damage of the same type.

Bomb or Spell
